import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; import { authService } from '../../services/auth'; import { geolocationService } from '../../services/geolocation'; import './SafetyCheck.css'; const SafetyCheck = () => { const [checkingIn, setCheckingIn] = useState(false); const [lastCheckIn, setLastCheckIn] = useState(null); const [location, setLocation] = useState(null); const [safetyScore, setSafetyScore] = useState(92); const userInfo = authService.getUserInfo(); const handleSafetyCheckIn = async () => { setCheckingIn(true); try { const position = await geolocationService.getEnhancedPosition(); setLocation(position); // Simulate API call with progress await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 2000)); setLastCheckIn(new Date()); setSafetyScore(prev => Math.min(prev + 2, 100)); // Increase safety score toast.success('‚úÖ Safety check-in successful! Your contacts have been notified.'); } catch (error) { console.error('Check-in error:', error); toast.error('‚ùå Failed to check in. Please try again.'); } finally { setCheckingIn(false); } }; const handleQuickActions = (action) => { switch (action) { case 'location': toast.success('üìç Location shared with emergency contacts'); break; case 'assistance': toast.info('üÜò Non-emergency assistance requested'); break; case 'update': toast.success('üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß‚Äçüë¶ Status update sent to family'); break; case 'emergency': toast.error('üö® Emergency services contacted!'); break; default: break; } }; return (
